General.Name: Smalto SA
General.Description: Smalto Holding SA designs and sells ready to wear and accessories. The company ready to wear includes autumn winter, suits, tuxedos, jackets, pants, vests, coats and leathers, knit and jersey, shirts, and ceremonial outfits; and accessories comprise shoes; scarf, beanie, and hat and cap; leather goods and belt; ties, bow ties, and pocket squares; cufflinks and jewelry; eyeglasses; and gloves. Smalto Holding SA was formerly known as DS Holding SA and changed its name to Smalto Holding SA in May 2009. The company is based in Paris, France.
